text: allāhu niṅṅaḷe niravadhi sandarbhṅṅaḷil sahāyicciṭṭuṇṭ. hunayn ‎yud'dhadinattiluṁ. ann niṅṅaḷuṭe eṇṇapperuppaṁ niṅṅaḷe ‎durabhimānikaḷākki. ennāl ā saṅkhyādhikyaṁ niṅṅaḷkkeāeṭṭuṁ ‎nēṭṭamuṇṭākkiyilla. bhūmi vaḷare viśālamāyirikke tanne at paṟṟe ‎iṭuṅṅiyatāyi niṅṅaḷkkuitēānni. aṅṅane niṅṅaḷ pintiriññēāṭukayuṁ ‎ceytu. ‎
